dimension: 8 3/8 x 2 1/2 x 7/8 in. (21.27 x 6.35 x 2.22 cm) (without fiber loop or fringe)
title: Knife Case
description: soft hide body; beaded front panel with green and blue beaded trim; flower motif at edges; stepped diamonds at center; multicolored braided plant fiber loop attached to back
